meanings.def: a long period of time when there is little or no rain
examples: Farmers are facing ruin after two years of severe drought.
one of the worst droughts on record
The country’s entire grain harvest has been hit by drought.
England has had several summer droughts in recent years.
Large areas of Africa are affected by severe drought.
Some of the newer plants in the garden died during the drought.
Crop failures were caused by drought and a lack of fertilizer.

meanings.def: a long period of time when there is a lack of something that is needed or wanted
examples: The team is desperate to end a ten-game goal drought.
